Name: Gabriel
description:
Gabriel is a humble and hardworking young man who is a small fish farmer in his village.

Most of the time, he is doing his daily activities by feeding and looking after his fish (the pond behind him is his fish pond). After the fishes are grown, he usually harvests, then transports them to local markets or just to a fishmonger to sell. He has been raising and selling fish for a few years now with his own working capital. Every day he is busy with farming because he makes a living from it.

Now, he is requesting a loan of $900 from KIF to help with his aquaculture activity. Gabriel will used this loan to buy advance equipment, fish food, and more baby fish to raise on his aquaculture farm.
